label: ball
caption: A playful black and white dog bounds through the lush green yard, its tail wagging excitedly as it carries a bright blue ball in its mouth. The sun casts dappled shadows on the grass, and a few palm trees sway gently in the breeze behind the dog. In the background, a colorful beach umbrella stands near a small house with a thatched roof, adding to the tropical ambiance of the scene.
